Containers.Name: CA Docker Autostart Manager
Containers.Description: Community Applications' Docker Autostart Manager allows you to specify the order in which docker applications start up, along with selectable delays between starts of applications
Containers.Changes:
###2017.02.21 - Changed port available criteria to a more accurate one, and add in IP addresses to test
###2017.02.18 - Added: Option to wait until a port is available from the app before carrying on
###2016.12.17 - Fixed: Remove not installed apps when updating settings
###2016.12.08 - Fixed: Under certain circumstances, a spurious Cron Job email could be sent out.
###2016.11.25 - Changes to let unRaid webGUI start when long delays on startup apps are present
###2016.11.13 - Initial Release
